name: Park Inn by Radisson Zurich Airport

reviews.text: So, I'm travelling a lot at the moment, and Zurich features heavily in my plans over coming weeks. After my less than enjoyable stay at Ibis Messe, I decided to try one star higher, with little additional cost. I can assure you, it's worth it.
reviews.title: Terrific Airport Hotel

reviews.text: The Park Inn Zurich Airport sits right underneath the flightpath. yet bizarrely is some 15 minutes away by transfer coach. Not that it bothered me, as there is some stunning scenery on the transfer, which is facilitated by an adequately sized vehicle.
reviews.title: Never stay here if you want to sleep!

reviews.text: The reception is bright, and inviting, with extremely polite, friendly staff. The bar sits off it, and rooms are spread from the ground floor to the 4th. Check in was swift, and I was unlucky not to get a room with an airport view - because I'm a geek I'mm go back there for that alone.
reviews.title: No air conditioning and dirty comforter. Horrible.

reviews.text: The rooms are, I believe, quirky and comfortable. Entering into the open plan room, your closet is to the left, with a separate toilet on the right, with the sink opposite. The bedroom 'area' is a continuation of the open plan theme, leading to the entertainment centre which swivels to allow maximum comfort. Finally, a seating area by the window exists, with a workstation which is spacious and clutter free. The beds are excellent, the pillows heavenly. Tea and Coffee making facilities are provided, and a vending machine is further along the hallway should you not wish to use the CHF5.00 bottle of water provided.
reviews.title: Clean and comfortable for a quick overnight

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The bar area is very modern, with a themed water-wall down oneside, offering views out over parkland and towards the airport. The staff here were struggling with the beer pumps, and seemed annoyed we arrived to drink, well, beer. They did not offer the same warm greeting the reception staff do on the 3 occasions I used the lounge. Table service is offered for both diners and drinkers, as is typical.
reviews.title: Good transit hotel close to the airport.

reviews.text: Shuttle to the airport wasn't very nice (mono-syllabic driver), big cheap fast food restaurant sharing the façade, spartan entrance and our floor was in renovation, so walking through cement and dust (without warning). Thus the arrival did not bode well.
reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised

reviews.text: This is by far the best (for the price) Airport Hotel in Zurich. Why pay almost double for a room at the Radisson Airport? The rooms are modern and well designed, there is a free shuttle to/from the airport, staff is nice and courteous. If you arrive by car, indoor parking is available at a reasonable price. Take the shuttle to the airport and from there the train (or the tram) to the city and it should get you there in 30 minutes. There is also a train station (Ruemlang) about 10 minutes walking distance from the hotel with direct trains to downtown Zurich.
reviews.title: Nice Price! Nice Hotel!

reviews.text: The rates are even lower now with the new competition across the street (HI Express).
reviews.title: Good and worth place if u are for few or couple days in zurich

reviews.text: If you get hungry, there is a McDonalds adjacent to the Hotel and it is open until 5 am!
reviews.title: Good for tourists with short stay

reviews.text: I went there with my family from 15 to 18 of june of 2012 the hotel its a nice place close to zurich airport which looks very nice and its a good deal for the price if you consider that switzerland its really expensive and you are planning to spend few days in zurich area,just keep on mind that since its close to the airport theres nothing to do around there but you can get the shuttle to the airport from the hotel which is free and from there you can take the train to zurich downtown or different areas in switzerland just get the schedules from trains or shuttle so you can be there on time and in the right place or the other option that you have is to get to rumlang station and then walk to the hotel but im highly recommend the option to take shuttle and then a train to go around from flughafen airport since its more easy and faster specially if you are not familiarized with trains in ch.and regards the hotel its very nice and clean we got a triple room and it was pretty big,beds are so confortable theres no noise even that is close to the airport so you can sleep really good,we loved room decoration and also the bathroom was good cause wc and shower are separated so if theres no problems if more than one person in the room,the staff its helpful and nice specially the guy at front desk during night shift ( blond guy) i dont remember his name he was so helpful during check inn even if we arrived late on the night,staff from shuttle its not really nice we were a little dissapointed with that since they dont help you with your lugage they dont make any effort to understand you since they dont speak good english,spanish or any other language than german and they even yell at you common i think that park inn can work hard to change that,another thing that we were a little dissapointed is that they dont offer free wifi as many hotels do it and that its businness center is just limited to two computers and no chairs in the middle of the lobby,fitness area looks good even if we didnt had the time to use it,also one thing that we got really upset even its no hotel default it was that they were repairing the only access from the airport to hotel so it was really stressing to get there because we arrived late and somebody picked us at airport so it was not easy to access,anyway if i go back zurich of course i will consider park inn as option to stay,and i will recommend that place,we really like it just few thing that i mentioned that they can improve greetings from mexico!
reviews.title: value for money and very helpful staff

reviews.text: We stayed one day each in and out of Zurich in this nice hotel during our recent visit to Switzerland. They have a shuttle service from Airport to Hotel and vice versa which works efficiently. The reception is quick and efficient. Rooms are modern and have all facilities. We had a problem with bulbs in the bath; and they got an electrician in the night of a Sunday to come and fix it.The reception staff are helpful in giving local city information, visits to other cities and flight status.
reviews.title: Wouldn't stay here again

aka: Park Inn By Radisson Zurich Airport Hotel Rumlang
